trans-unit.source: A static extension methods class for getting a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> instance from an <xref href="System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得するための静的な拡張メソッド クラス、<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>インスタンスから、 <xref href="System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage"> </xref>インスタンス</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> instance from an <xref href="System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 作成、<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>インスタンスから、 <xref href="System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage"> </xref>インスタンス</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> instance can be read, written and copied just as a traditional <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ByteStreamMessage> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>インスタンスの読み取り、書き込まれ、従来と同様コピー<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ByteStreamMessage>インスタンス</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ByteStreamMessage></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> instance can also "read" to retrieve the original <xref:System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage> instance by calling the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageExtensionMethods.ToHttpResponseMessage%2A> extension method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>インスタンスできますも「読み取り」、元の取得に<xref:System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage>を呼び出してインスタンス、<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageExtensionMethods.ToHttpResponseMessage%2A>拡張メソッド</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageExtensionMethods.ToHttpResponseMessage%2A></xref:System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage"></xref> from which to create the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> instance.
